titles.title: To permit refund of customs duties on certain drawback entries upon presentation of certificates of delivery.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Unfavorable Executive Comment Received from Treasury.

bill.summary: 4/20/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the drawback (refund) of duty on a certain entry upon the presentation of the appropriate certificates of delivery to the appropriate customs officer.
